content.body: Does anyone know why `BigInt.asIntN` is a static method? `BigInt.asIntN(8, 1234n)` and not `1234n.asIntN(8)`
content.formatted_body: Does anyone know why BigInt.asIntN is a static method? BigInt.asIntN(8, 1234n) and not 1234n.asIntN(8)
